EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Email Send--few days left $400 discount--6-
EmailTemplate.subject: Only a few days left to save $400 on your SpringOne Platform pass
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Join us December 4-7 in San Francisco for SpringOne Platform 2017 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-price-cliff-earlybird-email]]>, the premier conference for those who build, deploy, and run cloud-native software. This unique four-day event brings together leading software companies, enterprises, and cloud experts to collaborate, share knowledge, and create transformational software.
Save $400 Off A Standard Conference Pass Early Bird registration and discounted training prices end on June 24, 2017 at 11:59 PM (Pacific Daylight Time). Register now <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=&utm_medium=&utm_campaign=]]> and save $400 before it’s too late!
Call For Papers Are Now Open. Share Your Story! If you have a software story to share with the world, we would love to have you propose a session. Join speakers from Microsoft, Google, Comcast and Liberty Mutual by submitting a talk <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/eSites/s1p/profile]]> to SpringOne Platform.
We continuously update the SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-price-cliff-earlybird-email]]> website with new speakers, workshops, and trainings, so be sure to check in on occasion.
We look forward to seeing you there, The SpringOne Platform Team
© 2017 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[http://info.pivotal.io/c000200I0NAU0rCJC001O00]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://info.pivotal.io/TDAIO000r0000U220N00CJ0]]>.
